thread.title: 5-star LB Lyndell 'Mack' Wilson enjoys LSU visit
thread.title_full: 5-star LB Lyndell 'Mack' Wilson enjoys LSU visit | NOLA.com

author: Amos Morale III, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: 5-star LB Lyndell 'Mack' Wilson enjoys LSU visit
text:
LSU drew a good review from five-star linebacker Lyndell "Mack" Wilson. Wilson tweeted that he enjoyed the visit and had a great time.
The standout from Montgomery, Ala. put the Tigers in his top 8 he released earlier this month. LSU was second to Florida, his top school.
Wilson told NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune that both schools along with the other six made the cut because they offer the degree programs he's looking for.
The Tigers beat the Gators 35-28 Saturday to remain undefeated in what was one of the biggest games of the season.
Wilson's interest in the the Tigers was sparked by his relationship wiht LSU defensive coordinator.
"Coach (Kevin) Steele was at 'Bama and he went to LSU," Wilson said. "That kind of carried over to LSU and me and coach Steele got a good relationship."
Wilson has also unofficially visited Alabama and said he expect to take his official visits after the season.
